FuncDef: The set device id-led command sets the status of a device ID indicator. The set device id-led command sets the status of a device ID indicator. By default, a device ID indicator is off.
CLIs: set device id-led { off | on } [ slot <slotid> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies that the ID indicator is off.
-

Specifies that the ID indicator is on.
-

Indicates the slot number.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
If no slot ID is specified, the configuration takes effect for all slots.

ExtraInfo: When users need to locate and repair a device, you can run the set device id-led command to remotely set the status of the device ID indicator.
